The claim originated from an article on: which reported that American legislator John Grumpart wanted to ban Canadians from driving in the United States.
The article included quotes from an inte: where he expressed his belief that Canadians do not possess the necessary skills to drive on American roads.
The article was accompanied by an: interview" with Grumpart, which was part of the satirical program "This Is That" on CBC Radio.
The fact that the: This Is That" program is known for fabricating news stories and has been mistaken for real news in the past adds to the doubt about the authenticity of the claim.
